SEARCH

Uses of Class
JEST.model.Player

Packages that use Player
Package
Description
JEST.controller
This package contains the controller of the application : ConsoleController : It permits the interactions between the user and the console, using the scanner.
JEST.model
This package contains the controller of the application : Game : This is the most important class of the game.
JEST.model.cards.trophy
This package contains all the trophies of the game : We have the interface Trophy which is implemented by the 6 classes for each trophy.
JEST.model.virtualPlayer
This package contains the three strategies possible for VirtualPlayer : We have the AgressiveStrategy, the DefensiveStrategy and the RandomStrategy.
JEST.view
This package contains the classes adapted to the view of the application : We have the MainWindow and all the panels.

    We see who is the player with the Joker in his Jest.
    Player

    We see who have the lowest face value in the suit of the trophy.
    Player
    MajorityFaceValueTrophy.getWinner(List<Player> players)
    We add one to the the counter if the card has the same face value as the trophy.
    Player
    Trophy.getWinner(List<Player> players)
    Returns the winner of the trophy.

    VirtualPlayer
    A virtual player will make an Offer and choose an offer under his Strategy pre-defined.
    Methods in JEST.model.virtualPlayer that return Player
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Player
    AgressiveStrategy.chooseOffer(VirtualPlayer player, List<Player> players)
    We compute the points of each face-up cards in the other offers.
    Player

    We compute the points of each face-up cards in the other offers.
    Player
    RandomStrategy.chooseOffer(VirtualPlayer player, List<Player> players)
    He chooses randomly a card among all the cards available (the face-up and the face-down cards).
